projects.title: Naushad Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Showcased projects, achievements, education,
 about me, and skills in the portfolio to.
 -effectively communicate my strengths and
 accomplishments.
 - Enhanced the portfolio website with modern
 features, including support for dark mode, to
 stay up-to-date with industry trends.
 - Utilized React.js, React-Hooks, React-Routing,
 and Bootstrap to create a responsive website.

projects.title: Visitor Management System
projects.bodyText:
- A Visitor Management System (VMS) is a software application designed to manage and track visitors to a particular location or facility.
 - Its primary purpose is to enhance security, streamline the visitor check-in process, and maintain a digital record of visitor information for future reference. Here are some key features and functionalities typically found in a Visitor Management System:

projects.title: TSW BID
projects.bodyText:
- At TSW.BID we buy returned and overstocked goods from top retailers and sell them in online auctions.
 - All auctions start at just $1. We have over 40,000 winners each day.
 - Did you win?
 - Pick up items at one of our 20+ locations.
 - TSW BID Web App using with multiple platform hendel product wordpres,laravel and shopify

projects.title: Simprosys Google Shopping Feed
projects.bodyText:
- Simprosys Google Shopping Feed is Submits Feed for Google Shopping, Microsoft, Facebook & Pinterest.
 - Manages Shopping Campaigns / PMax The app supports product feed submission for Google Shopping, Free Listings on Google, Facebook Shop, Checkout on Facebook, FB Dynamic Product Ads, Instagram Shop, Google Local Inventory Ads, Pinterest Ads, and Microsoft Shopping Ads.
 - You can easily create & manage Google Ads Performance Max (PMax) Campaigns and Microsoft Ads Smart Shopping Campaigns, with an option to set up conversion tracking & dynamic remarketing tagging to measure campaign performance.
 - Google Analytics 4 (GA4)Tracking Setup

projects.title: Google Shopping by Simprosys
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that loads data from mock API and show in both **LinearLayout** and **GridLayout RecyclerView**.
 - Offline support using **Room** DB and **NetworkBoundResource**.
 - Uses the **MVVM** architecture.

projects.title: Feed List App
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that loads list of feeds from a **paginated** API and shows in a RecyclerView.
 - Uses the **MVVM** architecture.
 - Uses **Paging 3** library along with other Architecture Components.

projects.title: Task Tracker
projects.bodyText:
- A simple Task Tracker web app made with **Angular 12**.
 - Uses **mock JSON server** to get, add, delete or update tasks.

projects.title: Image Encryption/Decryption
projects.bodyText:
- A Web App for Image Encryption and Decryption made in **Django**.
 - Uses **SDES** algorithm for encryption/decryption.
